biography.description: Pioneer of TourismTech vertical based out of Goa, India. Currently the COO at FiiRE Goa. Started as a student entrepreneur at the age of 21 & ran India’s largest incubation program based out of T-Hub, Hyderabad.

blogSection.title: TourismTech -The inception story check
blogSection.subtitle: This is a quitting story
blogSection.content:
In June 2020, after a lot of discussions and deliberations I decided to quit the idea of TourismTech.I spoke to all the stakeholders in Tourism Industry. Startups were also skeptical about this initiative and its timing. Because most of them were my well-wishers & they want the best for me in my career.A call to my friend changed my thought process.
I said, ‘ tell me one good reason to pursue the idea of Tourism Accelerator. Why I shouldn’t do I know by now.’And the answer for that – If you are doing this when everything is fine then you are like anyone else. Everyone will remember you when the normal world is back for the support you guys extended during the tough times.It was good enough to pursue this idea. And it turns out the accelerator program became a successful one in terms of a concept. We got 50+ applications from 6 different countries.
We ended up having Goa Tourism Department as the partner for the event.This is the simple version of how a new vertical called TourismTech was created.I’ll keep on updating this space with what’s happening. Because I feel journaling is needed to track the progress of this initiative.

AboutSection.description: Dynamic and experienced entrepreneur with a decade of rich experience in founding and leading startups, facilitating ecosystem development, and fostering community growth. Proven expertise in all aspects of program and project management, encompassing ideation, planning, strategy implementation, and execution, while effectively utilizing time, resources, and financial allocations. Demonstrates a strong passion to become an ecosystem enabler, leveraging skills in community building to drive startup initiatives within corporate and government entities. Committed to cultivating a unique startup culture that fosters innovation and embraces openness.

timestamp.Content: Creating an ecosystem for TourismTech stakeholders in the country from Goa. A Go To Market program for growth stage startups in Tourism industry. FiiRE partnered with International stakeholders for various initiatives.  Startegic partner for Tourism Innovation Summit at Spain.
